category: news
title: "AI networks are more vulnerable to malicious attacks than previously thought"
excerpt: "Artificial intelligence tools hold promise for applications ranging from autonomous vehicles to the interpretation of medical images. However, a new study finds these AI tools are more vulnerable than previously thought to targeted attacks that effectively force AI systems to make bad decisions."
